message: Let's be fair and split the money, Bob. I'm offering you 40% which is a good deal considering the inflation.
Your offer was tempting Alice, but the inflation makes it a bad deal for me in the long run. Let's be realistic, how about a 55/45 split in my favor?

Bob, your sense of reality is a bit skewed. I offered you a fair deal in the beginning.  I'll take the 55/45 split but in my favor this time.  Take it or leave it - the deal will be worse for you if we go another round.
